A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: butchered lukes character. Made a hero\, that already faced down his father a dark lord\, and turn him\, along with facing the emperor into a whiny coward. Way too many unexplained characters that were built up and hyped up. More plot holes than pot holes in Wisconsin\, and it felt like Rosie Od wrote the comedic script. It also was surprisingly political\, but if you didn't catch that then i won't get into it. So let down by this movie
